title: Silly girl, Don’t You Know You Are My Beloved Wife? - Novel Updates
author: 朱朱
description:
As an illegitimate daughter, Wei Yiyi took the blame from her family after witnessing her husband have an affair with her sister, all because she failed to get pregnant; The family even asked her to get divorce and let her pregnant sister marry her husband!

But this time, Wei Yiyi didn’t give in cowardly, “I will not get divorce, I will make your grandchild bear the name of a bastard like I do!”

But for making Yiyi be willing to divorce, her family made trouble in her company and framed her to be third person in the marriage. How ridiculous!

Facing with these accusations, Lin Tianyuan, the brother of her husband, stand up for her: “Mr. Wei, if you don’t want your company to go bankrupt, get the hell out of here! ”

As Lin Tianyuan came closer and closer, she tried to keep distance with him: “I am your sister-in-law, don’t you think your behavior is really inapproriate?”  “Dont worry,  soon you won’t be.”>
